generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance with cars parked along both sides.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and adjacent to buildings.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, featuring various architectural styles and windows.
- pole: A pole with a parking sign is visible on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign with a "P" symbol and additional text is mounted on the pole on the right.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street, providing shade and greenery.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing partly cloudy.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle in the middle of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along both sides of the road.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
